text: P.I. Private Investigations (also known as Private Investigations) is a 1987 crime-thriller film directed by Nigel Dick and starring Clayton Rohner, Ray Sharkey and Paul Le Mat.VV.AA. Variety Film Reviews, Volume 20. Garland Pub., 1989. ==Premise== A young architect finds himself being stalked by a gang of criminals who believe he knows something that could expose their activities. ==Cast== *Clayton Rohner as Joey Bradley *Ray Sharkey as Ryan *Paul Le Mat as Detective Wexler *Talia Balsam as Jenny Fox *Phil Morris as Eddie Gordon *Martin Balsam as Cliff Dowling * William Kerwin as Anthony *Anthony Zerbe as Charles Bradley, Joey's Father *Robert Ito as Kim *Vernon Wells as Detective North *Anthony Geary as Larry * Justin Lord as Howard White *Richard Cummings Jr. as Hollister * Desiree Boschetti as Denise *Andy Romano as Mr. Watson *Sydney Walsh as Janet * Jon St. Elwood as Gil *Robert Torti as Burglar * Nigel Dick as Photographer ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980s crime thriller films Category:English-language films Category:American crime thriller films Category:American films Category:1987 directorial debut films
